name: Damian Franciszek Pospiech
profile_summary:
Results-driven Senior Field Engineer with a proven track record in **automation**, **troubleshooting**, and **problem-solving** within the tech landscape. Leveraging **salesforce** expertise to enhance customer service and communication with clients, ensuring efficient project execution and satisfaction. Possesses extensive experience in **robotics** and **electro-opto-mechanical** systems, coupled with a robust understanding of high-performance applications developed in various sectors.

Full Stack Developer with 13+ years of experience delivering applications across healthcare and financial industries. Skilled in **JavaScript/TypeScript**, **Python**, and **Flutter**, with hands-on expertise in both frontend and backend development using **React**, **Next.js**, **Vue**, **Node.js**, **FastAPI**, and **Django**. Experienced in building AI/ML-powered platforms that support predictive analytics, automation, and real-time processing. Proficient in deploying cloud-native systems on **AWS** and **Azure**, and implementing microservices, event-driven architectures, and **CI/CD** pipelines. Well-versed in compliance-driven development, aligning solutions with HIPAA, FHIR, PCI DSS, and SOC 2 standards, and possessing a strong background in MLOps, including model training, serving, and orchestration using **MLflow**, **Airflow**, and **Kubeflow**.
